event.description: Make your night fun, as Classic Rock Coffee Co. invites you for a night with singer-songwriter Willy Rimsu. The singer-songwriter will take the stage and perform a variety of Peppy Rock and Retro Numbers. Dance and sway to hits like "Strawberry Fields," "Twist & Shout" and "Don't Let Me Down."
event.title: Saturday Night Live With Willy Rimsu

event.description:
Spend your Sunday afternoon devouring our scrumptious brunch from 12:30 PM to 4:30 PM while listening to some great retro music.

Enjoy the superb spread at our Classic Sunday Brunch which gives unlimited veg/non-veg food for Rs 500 and with unlimited veg-non veg food, IMFL, beers, select cocktails and Sangria for Rs. 1000 all inclusive. 

This includes a wide range of delicious veg/nov-veg starters.

For enquiries call:
7719063330 / 7721923335
event.title: Sunday Brunch

event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
event.description:
Every Monday we have Happy Hours till closing time. 

Bollywood Karaoke will never be the same again. 
For the first time ever, Red FM 93.5's RJ Shrikant will be the regular host of an event at a venue. 
Presenting Red FM Gaa Ke Bajaa with RJ Shrikant at Classic Rock Coffee Co.

Keep listening to MH935 Mon to Fri 5 to 9 pm on 93.5 Red FM to get a chance to win free invites to be a guest of RJ Shrikant at Classic Rock with food and drinks included. 

Listen to his show MH935 during the week between 5 and 9 pm and get a chance to win invited as his guest at Classic Rock every Monday for the Bollywood Karaoke. 

Join him in singing, eating, drinking, dancing and laughing all night long.
event.title: Happy Hours till closing + Bollywood Karaoke

event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
event.description:
Ladies get your free drinks and join the most happening Karaoke Night in town. Sing and drink your heart out. Open to both ladies and guys of course. 

This Wednesday it's a mixed karaoke where you can sing in the language of your choice.
event.title: Ladies Night with Mixed Karaoke
